head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BONSAL, JEAN C. (CAVEN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BONSAL, JEAN C. (CAVEN)

block.p: BONSAL-Jean C. (Caven). Of Upper Montclair, on October 25, 2000. Beloved wife of Richard I. Bonsal. Loving mother of Julia L. Bonsal Esq., Mrs. Sarah Bonsal Miller, Mrs. Martha Bonsal Day. Sister of Sara Caven Boland. Also survived by seven grandchildren. Funeral services will be held at the St. James Episcopal Church, 581 Valley Road, Upper Montclair, today, at 10 AM. In lieu of flowers, donations to the Montclair Public Library, 50 S. Fullerton Ave., Montclair, NJ 07042, in Mrs. Bonsal's memory would be appreciated.
